sentences.en: Applies an accumulator function over a sequence.
sentences.cn: 对序列应用累加器函数.

sentences.en: Assembling automobile and their his machinery uses an accumulator cell.
sentences.cn: 组装汽车及其他机械用蓄电池.

sentences.en: Design condition and debugging data of heat accumulator are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了蓄热器的设计条件和调试数据.

sentences.en: Development content includes accumulator and fuel cell dynamoelectric technology.
sentences.cn: 开发内容包括蓄电池和燃料电池电动技术.

sentences.en: Disuse the ampere of power source and accumulator cell [ the armrest moves ].
sentences.cn: 不用安电源及蓄电池 [ 靠手动 ].

sentences.en: Here is our accumulator which has that nitrogen overpressure which upon loss of pressure in the core would automatically insert coolant into the core should there be a break.
sentences.cn: 这是我们的蓄电池，那已经氮过度增压,面临着在核心里压力的损失,那会自动的加入冷却剂到,核心去，然后就会产生一个破裂。

sentences.en: In this design, the energy recovery system uses a hydraulic accumulator.
sentences.cn: 在本设计中, 系统采用的是液压蓄能器.

sentences.en: Intermittent clutch or accumulator seal performance.
sentences.cn: 间歇离合器或贮积器封口性能.

sentences.en: Load the data to accumulator or adder according to the instruction.
sentences.cn: 将在存贮器数据寄存器的数据,根据指令载入加法器或累加器.

sentences.en: Mary, the car does not work. i think the; accumulator is out of energy.
sentences.cn: 玛丽, 车子发不动了. 我想是 电瓶 没电了.

sentences.en: Please note that cut off the accumulator power supply before installing.
sentences.cn: 安装前,必须先断开蓄电池的电源.

sentences.en: The accumulator must operate within the prescribed extreme operating temperatures.
sentences.cn: 储能器只允许在低于推荐操作温度下的环境中工作.

sentences.en: The specified seed value is as the initial accumulator value.
sentences.cn: 将指定的种子值用作累加器初始值.

sentences.en: This moves the carry into bit position of the accumulator.
sentences.cn: 把进位移到累加器的位元.

sentences.en: This paper designed an extended multiplication - accumulator unit, DSPMAC, to achieve calculation accelerating.
sentences.cn: 本文设计了扩展的乘累加单元(DSPMAC), 用于运算速度的提高.

sentences.en: To form the results of an operation in an accumulator.
sentences.cn: 在累加器中形成运算结果.

words.tran_cn: 累计的；累积的；积聚而成的

trans.tran_cn: <英>蓄电池，积聚者，蓄势器，收集器，蓄电池组
trans.tran_en: a rechargeable device for storing electrical energy in the form of chemical energy, consisting of one or more separate secondary cells
